metadata.name: The Tempest
metadata.description:
Inspired by one of Shakespeare's late plays called 'The Tempest'.

The main character, a sorcerer and former duke named Prospero escapes into a remote island when his brother Antonio usurps the throne.

Many years passed, a ship carrying Antonio passes near the island, and Prospero, in an act of revenge, conjures up a storm to destroy the ship, leaving him and his crew shipwrecked.

Dimensions: 3072x4096px
